Articles.Content: Thank you so much, nogui87!!! It looks great, exactly what I asked for!

Wondering if someone could hook me up with flag that looks something like the United Nations globe, except with a polar view of Kerbin, and with some sort of wings or something in place of the wreath that iss wrapped around the globe. I would like the color scheme to be a black background, and gold as all the lines. Thanks in a advance.

Wondering if someone could hook me up with flag that looks something like the United Nations globe, except with a polar view of Kerbin, and with some sort of wings or something in place of the wreath that iss wrapped around the globe. I would like the color scheme to be a black background, and gold as all the lines. Thanks in a advance.
The symbol of the empire from foundation series

Firstly i am of the opinion you should recieve a medal for this.

Secondly i would like a UN light blue coloured helmet( in the shape of the Grossdeutchsland emblem, see link) on a background of a planet with rings(saturn like). The rings at an angle, the planet can be white or whatever colour you see fit. the overall background something dark blue or black.

Most appreciated.

http://www.cafepress.com/mf/21134784/grossdeutschland-helmet_tshirt
That's exactly what I was thinking. Thanks alot, I can't wait to implement this flag. I'm thinking the new .21 save game will be United Kerbin Enterprises.

I would like to formally request a flag, if that would be okay. Here's what I had in mind:

I would like, please, for a flag that would have the words "HockeyTech" printed across the bottom of the flag. Over the letters, I was hoping for the planet Kerbin to be printed, but with the oceans being one shade of blue and the land being a shade of white. Across Kerbin, I would like for a hockey stick. If you don't mind, I would like the hockey stick to be outlined; just the shape of the stick with a line or two across the top (the handle) and a few more on the bottom (the blade). Surrounding everything, I would sorta like for a few stars printed here and there. And lastly, I would like for the backround to be the same color as the planet's oceans.

If someone could create this flag, it would make my day. I apologize if I sound greedy or rude with how my words came out, I'm not trying to be. Thanks in advance.

THP

P.S. If someone could show me how you guys create the flags, I would be happy to help out with making them. I've never really learned how to make flags, and I've been meaning to learn ever since 0.20 came out. Thanks again.

Edited August 1, 2013 by TheHockeyPlayer
I would love a flag with this logo:

my new Flag: Kerbin Space Agency

I was actually gonna ask for something kind of similar to this except in silver and with a little shuttle leaving the planet instead of wings, complete with K.S.A at the top and a caption at the bottom reading "Assaulting Kerbin's Aerospace Since 2011"

I'd have gave it a shot myself but I lack any form of artistic ability when it comes to drawing.

my new Flag: Kerbin Space Agency

Request accepted. Just to be sure of what you want: the same polar view (or may be an equatorial view) of Kerbin in silver on a black background. You want a shuttle or a rocket could make it too? Just tell me what do you prefer.

Request accepted. Just to be sure of what you want: the same polar view (or may be an equatorial view) of Kerbin in silver on a black background. You want a shuttle or a rocket could make it too? Just tell me what do you prefer.

Wow thanks man, I'll go for an equatorial with a rocket if that's ok? And yeah silver on black please

If you guys are still taking requests, I'd love some kind of stylized green frog on a solid color background (maybe blue, black, or white). Whatever color looks best.

Thanks

I played around in photoshop for a few minutes - see if you like either of these. I know you said you wanted a plain blue background the color of the oceans, but I also included one with a nebula-kind-of-thing since I thought it looked good.

I've got the full resolution one as well if you want it, I just didn't put it here so it wouldn't take up space, so just pm me.
